Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Saw A light ball cross my back yard traveling from east to west then turning to the north traneling across the canal
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Rotonda West
There were no other sightings in Rotonda West on or around July 15th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing at our bay window when this ball of light came out of now whereshot shot across my back yard and stopped beside a plam tree then sat there for a few minutes without moving or making a sound. Then shot acros the canal in a split second and hovered for a few minutes more then disspeared.I was not afraid at the time could not figure out what just my wife was sleeping at the time. I told her the next day. also told my kids who live out of state. That is all I told, because I did not want to get laughed at. I have been thinking a lot about it latley I watch UFO hunters all the time, on May 31st they had a rerun about orbs.and desided to tell you folks about it I felt nothing It did nothing except come and go in a few minutes Jerry
